summary: Six young computer hackers, sent to work on a derelict spaceship, are forced to match wits with a vengeful artificial intelligence that would kill to be human.
cast: Tenika Davis|Jason Momoa|Adrian Holmes|Kjartan Hewitt|Kyle Mac|Jadyn Wong|Sidney Leeder|Adam Butcher|Jeananne Goossen|Jessica Phillips|Dylan Harman|Allison Brennan|Kate Hewlett|Nathaniel Bacon|Meher Pavri|Alex Mallari Jr.
keywords: low budget sci fi movie|computer|spaceship|ghost in the machine|computer programmer
title: Debug
